title: 薄扶林大學討論區(30) 開Sem了

replies.msg:
[集思廣益]
Q：邊度book洗牙？
A：HKU portal -> Campus Information Services -> Service Departments -> University Health Service -> UHS Web Appointment Booking -> Dental Services -> 1) Dental Examination or -> 2) Dental Examination + Hygienist Appointment

Q：邊度睇course grade/workload？
A：https://triklo.com/

Q: 邊度搵hall g?
A: Cityu

Q:想讀書又想識朋友又想有覺好訓住唔住hall好?
A:唔好

Q:我中學冇讀XX科,係咪好蝕底?
A:大學要識自學,乖啦,咩都識就唔駛讀大學啦

Q:我想double major/minor xxx,有冇咩要求?
A:除左Quantitative finance有審查之外,其他等year2直接declare就得,建議盡量year1開始take少少second major既科

Q:點解我reg唔到COMP1117
A:因為好多人爭,多d扶阿婆過馬路啦

Q:邊個CC好grade又hea又好玩?
A:追post啦,btw個個CC都咁旬我自己唔去讀?
